preconditions.precondition: The Chef selects a dish to update allergen information.

successEndConditions.condition: The Chef successfully updates the allergen information for the dish.

mainSequence.step: Chef selects a dish to update allergen information.
Restaurant Management System requests dish details.
Menu Management Subsystem queries dish ingredients.
Menu Management Subsystem displays ingredients with allergy information.
Restaurant Management System shows ingredients and current allergy list to Chef.
Chef adds/removes allergens to/from the list.
Restaurant Management System updates allergy information.
Menu Management Subsystem updates dish ingredient allergy information.
Menu Management Subsystem confirms the update to Chef.
Restaurant Management System displays update confirmation to Chef.
